snippet: Greg Pierce’s “Slowgirl” is the third New York production in eight months for which the actress Sarah Steele has drawn critical acclaim playing adolescents.
abstract: Greg Pierce’s play Slowgirl is the third New York production in eight months for which the actress Sarah Steele has drawn critical acclaim playing adolescents.
lead_paragraph: Greg Pierce’s “Slowgirl” is the third New York production in eight months for which the actress Sarah Steele has drawn critical acclaim playing adolescents.

headline.main: Role After Role, She Cuts Years Off Her Age
